member.name: T:Landis.Data
member.summary: Methods for working with Landis data.

member.name: F:Landis.Data.InputVarName
member.summary: The name of the InputVariable that appears first in Landis text input.

member.name: F:Landis.Data.FileExtension
member.summary: The filename extension for files with serialized Landis data objects.

member.name: T:Landis.Data.CommentMarkers
member.summary: The markers for comments in Landis text data.

member.name: F:Landis.Data.CommentMarkers.Line
member.summary: The marker for comment lines.

member.name: F:Landis.Data.CommentMarkers.EndOfLine
member.summary: The marker for end-of-line comments.

member.name: M:Landis.Data.OpenTextFile(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a text file for reading.
member.remarks: The file is configured so that blank lines and comment lines are skipped, and end-of-line comments are trimmed. The marker for comment lines is ">" while the marker for end-of-line comments is "<<".

member.name: M:Landis.Data.Load``1(System.String,Landis.Utilities.ITextParser{``0})
member.summary: Loads an instance of T from a file. The file may contain a serialized form of an editable instance or it may be a text file that needs parsing.

member.name: M:Landis.Data.CreateTextFile(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new text file for writing.
member.param: Path of the text file.
member.remarks:
If the path contains any directories that does not exists, they are created.
If the file already exists, its current contents are overwritten.

member.name: M:Landis.Core.ExtensionMain.Run
member.summary: Runs the extension for the current timestep.

member.name: T:Landis.Core.ExtensionType
member.summary: The type of a plug-in.
member.remarks: Each type has a unique name, for example: "succession", "output", "disturbance:wind". For types that belong to the same group, the name of the group appears first followed by a colon. For example, "disturbance:fire" and "disturbance:wind".

member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: The type's name.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ExtensionType.Name
member.summary: The type's name.

member.name: M:Landis.Core.ExtensionType.IsMemberOf(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the type is a member of a group of types.

member.summary: Interface to the core framework for extensions.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.UI
member.summary: The user interface that the model writes information to.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.Species
member.summary: The dataset of species parameters for the scenario.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.Ecoregions
member.summary: The dataset of ecoregion parameters for the scenario.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.Ecoregion
member.summary: The ecoregion for each site on the landscape.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.Landscape
member.summary: The landscape for the scenario.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.CellLength
member.summary: The length of a side of a cell (a site on landscape).

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.CellArea
member.summary: The area of a cell (a site on landscape).

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.StartTime
member.summary: The calendar year that the scenario starts from.
member.remarks: This year represents time step 0, so the first year in the scenario is this year plus 1.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.EndTime
member.summary: The last calendar year in the scenario.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.CurrentTime
member.summary: The calendar year in the current time step.

member.name: P:Landis.Core.ICore.TimeSinceStart
member.summary: The number of years from StartTime to CurrentTime.

member.name: M:Landis.Core.ICore.RegisterSiteVar(Landis.SpatialModeling.ISiteVariable,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a site variable under a specific name.
member.param: The site variable being registered.
The name under which the site variable is to be registered.
member.exception: At least one of the parameters is null.
Another site variable has been previously registered with the same name.

member.name: M:Landis.Core.ICore.GetSiteVar``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a site variable with a specific name and data type.
member.param: The name under which the site variable is registered.
member.returns: The site variable that was registered under the given name, or null if no site variable has been registered under the name.
member.exception: The site variable registered with the given name has a different data type.

member.name: M:Landis.Core.ICore.Info(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes an informational message into the log.
member.param: Message to write into the log. It may contain placeholders for optional arguments using the "{n}" notation used by the System.String.Format method.
Optional arguments for the message.

member.name: M:Landis.Core.ICore.Initialize(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Initializes the random-number generator with a specific seed.

member.name: M:Landis.Core.ICore.GenerateSeed
member.summary: Generates a non-zero random seed using the system clock. This was found to fail on Mac OSX, due to identical results returned from System.Random (due to an internal error in System.Environment.TickCount) System.Random was replaced with System.Security.Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator by Brendan C. Ward on 6/4/2008

member.name: M:Landis.Core.IUserInterface.WriteLine(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes a formatted string to the user interface and the application log, using the same semantics as System.String.Format. A line terminator is written after the formatted string.
